mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eleme_order_state_change_message(eleme_order_id, order_id, state, shop_id, update_time, role, tenant_id, branch_id, create_user_id, last_update_user_id, last_update_remark) VALUES(#{elemeOrderId}, #{orderId}, #{state}, #{shopId}, #{updateTime}, #{role}, #{tenantId}, #{branchId}, #{createUserId}, #{lastUpdateUserId}, #{lastUpdateRemark})
